title: Interactive Data Dashboard
description: Built a real-time analytics dashboard with interactive visualizations using D3.js and React. Features dynamic filtering and responsive charts.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Mobile-first weather application using OpenWeather API. Includes 7-day forecasts, geolocation support, and beautiful animations.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack online store with shopping cart, payment integration, and inventory management. Built with Node.js and MongoDB.

title: Social Media Clone
description: Twitter-like social platform with user authentication, posts, likes, and real-time updates using WebSockets.

title: Task Management System
description: Collaborative project management tool with drag-and-drop Kanban boards, team assignments, and progress tracking.

title: Recipe Sharing Website
description: Community-driven recipe platform with user-generated content, ratings, comments, and advanced search functionality.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: Health and fitness application for logging workouts, tracking progress, and setting goals. Includes charts and statistics.

title: Portfolio Website Generator
description: Tool for creating custom portfolio sites with templates, drag-and-drop editor, and one-click deployment to GitHub Pages.

title: Music Streaming Interface
description: Spotify-inspired music player UI with playlists, search, and audio visualization. Integrates with music APIs.

title: Chat Application
description: Real-time messaging app with group chats, file sharing, and emoji support. Built using Socket.io for instant communication.

title: Blog Platform with CMS
description: Custom blogging system with markdown support, SEO optimization, and admin dashboard for content management.

title: Budget Tracking Tool
description: Personal finance manager for tracking expenses, creating budgets, and generating spending reports with visual breakdowns.
